Details: A comprehensive platform for modeling and analyzing complex systems using systems thinking principles
Enable users to model complex systems by capturing narratives and decomposing them into systems with stocks flows and causal relationships
Technical Specification: CRUD API with graph database storage

Details: Applicable to any domain requiring systems thinking: traffic systems urban planning organizational dynamics environmental systems business processes
Text-based descriptions of system behavior and context
Bounded entities with specific purposes and behaviors
Accumulations or things that can be measured at a point in time
Rates of change that affect stocks over time
Questions about system behavior dynamics and causality
Causal relationships between any entities with polarity and confidence
Narratives describe systems through DESCRIBES relationship
Systems can contain subsystems through CONSTITUTES relationship
Stocks belong to systems through DescribesStatic relationship
Flows belong to systems through DescribesDynamic relationship
Flows change stocks through Changes relationship with polarity
Any entity can causally influence any other through CausalLink
Go 1.23 with Gin web framework
Neo4j 5.15 Community Edition graph database
Docker Compose for development environment
gin-contrib/cors middleware for frontend integration
RESTful CRUD endpoints for all entities and relationships
Users create narratives describing system behaviors
Users extract systems stocks and flows from narratives
Users establish relationships between entities
Users define causal links with polarity and confidence
Users pose questions about system behavior
Users retrieve and analyze the complete system model
Create read update delete all types of entities
Create read delete all types of relationships
Persistent storage with relationship queries
Comprehensive testing of all endpoints
Complete API and data model documentation
Graph visualization of system models
Pattern detection and system analysis algorithms
Data import/export capabilities for system models
Multi-user system modeling and sharing
AI-assisted system modeling and analysis
Model urban traffic as a system with car stocks traffic flow rates and causal relationships
Model organizations with employee stocks hiring/firing flows and causal influences
Model ecosystems with population stocks migration flows and environmental causality
Model business systems with resource stocks process flows and operational causality
Systems thinking modeling platform with all entities and relationships
RESTful API with comprehensive CRUD operations
Graph database with proper schema and relationships
API testing and validation
Technical and API documentation
